verses.text: NA‘E toki ‘ohake ‘a Sīsū ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni ki he toafa ke ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘e he Tēvolo.
Pea hili ‘ene ‘aukai ‘i he ‘aho ‘e fāngofulu mo e pō ‘e fāngofulu, pea ne toki hālofia.
Pea ha‘u ‘a e Toko Taha Fakatauvele, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, “Kapau ko e ‘Alo koe ‘o e ‘Otua, fekau ke hoko ‘a e ngaahi fo‘i maka ni ko e ngaahi fo‘i mā.”
Ka ka tali ‘e ia ‘o pehē, Kuo tohi, ‘Oku ‘ikai mo‘ui ‘a e tangata ‘i he mā pē, ka ‘i he ngaahi folofola kotoa pē ‘oku ‘alu atu mei he fofonga ‘o e ‘Otua.
Pea toki ‘ave ia ‘e he Tēvolo ki he Kolo Tapu, ‘o ne fokotu‘u ia ki he tu‘ahivi ‘o e Temipale,
mo ne pehē ki ai, Kapau ko e ‘Alo koe ‘o e ‘Otua, hopo ki lalo; he kuo tohi, He kouna ‘e ia ‘ene kau ‘āngelo telia ‘a koe; pea te nau fataki nima koe na‘a pākia ho va‘e ‘i ha maka.
Pea lea ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, kuo tohi foki, ‘E ‘ikai te ke ha‘aki ‘ahi‘ahi‘i ‘a e ‘Eiki ko ho ‘Otua.
Pea ‘ave foki ia ‘e he Tēvolo ki ha mo‘unga na‘e mā‘olunga ‘aupito, ‘o ne faka‘ali‘ali ki ai ‘a e ngaahi pule‘anga kotoa pē ‘o māmani mo honau nāunau;
‘o ne pehē kiate ia, ko e ngaahi me‘a ni kotoa pē te u ‘atu mo‘ou, ‘o kapau te ke fakatōmape‘e ‘o lotu kiate au.
Pea toki pehē ‘e Sīsū, Sētane, fei mo ‘alu! he kuo tohi, Ko e ‘Eiki ko ho ‘Otua te ke lotu ki ai, pea ko ia pē toko taha te ke ‘otua ‘aki.
Pea toki tukuange ia ‘e he Tēvolo: pea ‘iloange na‘e ha‘u ha kau ‘āngelo ‘o fai ha tauhi kiate ia.
Pea ‘i he‘ene fanongo kuo tuku ‘a Sione ki he pilīsone, na‘a ne ‘alu ange ki Kāleli.
Pea ne hiki mei Nāsaleti, ‘o ne ‘alu ‘o nofo ‘i Kāpaneume, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he matātahi, ‘i he ngata‘anga ‘o Sepulone mo Nafitalai:
koe‘uhi ke fakamo‘oni ki he me‘a na‘e lea‘aki ‘e he palōfita ko ‘Aisea, ‘o pehē,
He fonua ‘o Sepulone, He fonua ‘o Nafitalai, He potu hanga ki tahi, ‘A Tu‘a Soatani, ‘A Kāleli ‘o Senitaile;
Ko e kakai nofo he po‘uli Na‘a nau mamata ki ha maama lahi; Pea ko e nofo he fonua tonu mo e malu ‘o Mate Na‘e hopo ha maama kiate kinautolu.
Mei he taimi ko ia na‘e kamata ‘a Sīsū ke malanga, ‘o pehē, Mou fakatomala, he kuo ofi ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani.
Pea ‘i he‘ene ‘eve‘eva ‘i he matātahi ‘o e Tahi Kāleli, na‘a ne vakai ki ha tautehina, ko Saimone ‘oku ui ko Pita, pea mo ‘Anitelū ko hono tehina ‘oku na sili, he ko e ongo toutai.
Pea pehē ‘e ia kiate kinaua, Mo omi ‘o muimui ‘iate au, pea te u ngaohi kimoua ko e ongo toutai tangata.
Pea na li‘aki leva hona kupenga, ‘o na muimui kiate ia.

Pea kuo ne laka atu mei ai, na‘a ne vakai ki ha tautehina kehe, ko Sēmisi ko e foha ‘o Sēpeti, pea mo Sione ko hono tehina, ‘oku nau ‘i he vaka mo Sēpeti ko ‘ena tamai, ‘o fai ‘enau pena kupenga. Pea na‘a ne ui kinaua.
Pea na tuku leva ‘a e vaka mo ‘ena tamai, ‘o na muimui kiate ia.

Pea na‘a ne foli ‘a Kāleli kātoa, he‘ene faiako ‘i honau ngaahi falelotu, mo ne malanga‘aki ‘a e Kōsipeli ‘o e Pule‘anga: pea neongo pe ko e hā ha alangamahaki na‘e ‘i he kakai ‘Isileli, pe ha mahamahaki, na‘a ne fakamo‘ui ia.

Pea mafola atu hono ongoongo ki Sīlia kātoa; pea nau ‘omi kiate ia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē na‘e puke, ‘a kinautolu na‘e mo‘ua, ‘i he ngaahi mahaki kehekehe ‘o fakamamahi, ‘a e ‘āvea mo e puke fakataimi mo e mamatea, pea na‘a ne fakamo‘ui kinautolu.
Pea na‘e tulimui kiate ia ha ngaahi fu‘u kakai lahi, mei Kāleli, mo Tikapolusi, mo Selusalema, mo Siutea, pea mo Tu‘a Soatani.
